whatIsGcx.title: What is GCX?
whatIsGcx.description: Simply put, GCX is a marketplace or a platform for buying and selling listed commodities. Starting with spot contracts for physical products, GCX will later trade in futures and options contracts for the listed commodities.

benefitsToMembers.title: Benefits to Members
benefitsToMembers.description: As a member, you gain access to a wide range of market actors (buyers and sellers) thereby creating opportunities for you to increase your revenue stream in a simplified manner, and without risk.

benefitsToSociety.title: Benefits to Society
benefitsToSociety.description: Apart from job creation, agricultural economic transformation will occur through the myriad of opportunities for value chain actors to achieve high levels of sustainable and equitable growth, from farmers who receive a premium on quality grains to traders who are guaranteed the right quality, with cash and contract settlement within a few days.
